targets.expr: histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(method_timed_seconds_bucket{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~"$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", env="$env"}[1m])) by (operationName, dc, pod_name, le))
http_server_requests_seconds{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~"$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName",  quantile="$quantile"}
method_timed_seconds{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~"$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", quantile="$quantile"}

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[1m])) by (env, instance, operationName, le))

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(method_timed_seconds_bucket{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[1m])) by (env, instance, operationName, le))

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~"$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", env="$env"}[1m])) by (operationName, dc, pod_name, le))
sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~"$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[1m])) by (operationName, dc, pod_name)
sum(rate(method_timed_seconds_count{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~"$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[1m])) by (operationName, pod_name, dc)
sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (env, instance, operationName)
sum(rate(method_timed_seconds_count{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (env, instance, operationName)
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}) by (pod_name)
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", area="heap"}) by (pod_name)
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName", area="heap"}) by (instance, env)
sum(jvm_memory_committed_bytes{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", area="heap"}) by (pod_name)
sum(jvm_memory_committed_bytes{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName", area="heap"}) by (env, instance)
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", area="nonheap"}) by (pod_name)
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName", area="nonheap"}) by (instance, env)
sum(jvm_memory_committed_bytes{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", area="nonheap"}) by (pod_name)
sum(jvm_memory_committed_bytes{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName", area="nonheap"}) by (instance, env)
sum(rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[1m])) by(pod_name, cause)

rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval]) / rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])
sum (increase(method_counted_total{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$__range])) by (operationName)

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(db_timed_seconds_bucket{db="$db", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[1m])) by (pod_name, path, le))
db_timed_seconds{db="$db", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(cassandra_timed_seconds_bucket{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*",  container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (pod_name, path, le))

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(db_timed_seconds_bucket{db="$db",env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*",  service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[1m])) by (pod_name, path, le))

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(cassandra_timed_seconds_bucket{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*",  service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (pod_name, method, le))

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(cassandra_timed_seconds_bucket{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*",  service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (pod_name, path, le))
sum(rate(db_timed_seconds_count{db="$db", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (path, pod_name)
sum(rate(cassandra_timed_seconds_count{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (pod_name, path)
sum(rate(db_timed_seconds_count{db="$db", env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (path, pod_name)
jdbc_connections_active{name="$db", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}
jdbc_connections_max{name="$db", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}

sum(rate(hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_sum{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"} [$interval])) by (pool, pod_name) /
sum(rate(hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"} [$interval])) by (pool, pod_name)

sum(rate(hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_sum{env=~"$env|$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"} [$interval])) by (pool, pod_name) /
sum(rate(hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum{env=~"$env|$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"} [$interval])) by (pool, pod_name)

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(rest_timed_seconds_bucket{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", status="success"}[$interval])) by (path, le, pod_name))
rest_timed_seconds{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", status="success", quantile="$quantile"}

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(rest_timed_seconds_bucket{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName", status="success"}[$interval])) by (path, le, pod_name))
rest_timed_seconds{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName", status="success", quantile="$quantile"}

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(rest_timed_seconds_bucket{env=~"$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name=~"$applicationName", instance=~"$podName",}[$interval])) by (path, le, pod_name, status))

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(rest_timed_seconds_bucket{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (method, le, pod_name))
sum(rate(rest_timed_seconds_count{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (path, status, pod_name)
sum(rate(rest_timed_seconds_count{env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (path, status, pod_name)

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(provider_timed_seconds_bucket{provider="s3",env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (pod_name, path, le))

sum(rate(provider_timed_seconds_count{ provider="s3", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (path, pod_name, status)

histogram_quantile($quantile, sum(rate(grpc_client_timed_seconds_bucket{status="success",env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (path, le, pod_name))
sum(rate(grpc_client_timed_seconds_count{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (path, status, pod_name)
sum(rate(sender_timed_seconds_bucket{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[1m])) by (pod_name, path, status)
sender_timed_seconds{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName", quantile="$quantile"}
sum(kafka_consumer_records_lag_records{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}) by (topic, pod_name)

sum(kafka_consumer_group_lag{group="strp", env="prod", service="consumer-lag", exported_group!="kafka.g.lebedev.group", exported_group!="console-consumer-8517", exported_group!="test_kafka_connection", exported_group=~"$applicationName.+|.+$applicationName.+|$applicationName"}) by (topic, exported_group)

panels.description: The average number of records in each request

targets.expr: sum(kafka_consumer_time_between_poll_max{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}) by (pod_name, client_id)

panels.title: Time between poll

panels.description: The average number of records in each request

targets.expr: sum(kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_per_request_avg{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}) by (pod_name, topic, client_id)

panels.title: Record per request

panels.description: The average fraction of time the consumer's poll() is idle as opposed to waiting for the user code to process records.

targets.expr: sum(kafka_consumer_poll_idle_ratio_avg{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}) by (pod_name, topic, client_id)

panels.title: Time the consumer's poll() is idle as opposed

targets.expr: sum(kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_fetch_size_max{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}) by (pod_name, client_id)

panels.title: The maximum number of bytes fetched per request

targets.expr: sum(kafka_producer_request_latency_avg{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}) by (kafka_name, pod_name, topic, client_id)
sum(kafka_producer_record_send_rate{env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}) by (pod_name, topic, client_id)
sum(rate(cache_gets_total{result="hit", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (name, pod_name)
sum(rate(cache_gets_total{result="hit", env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (name, pod_name)
sum(rate(cache_gets_total{result="miss", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (name, pod_name)
sum(rate(cache_gets_total{result="miss", env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (name, pod_name)

(sum(rate(cache_gets_total{result="miss", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (name, pod_name)) /
 (sum(rate(cache_gets_total{result="hit", env="$env", group=~"$namespace.*", container_name="$applicationName", pod_name=~".*$dc.*", pod_name=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (name, pod_name))

(sum(rate(cache_gets_total{result="miss", env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (name, pod_name)) /
 (sum(rate(cache_gets_total{result="hit",env=~"$dc-$env", group=~"$namespace.*", service=~"$applicationName-metrics", instance=~"$podName"}[$interval])) by (name, pod_name))
